patthana15.82:1.1: Saraṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ parittārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naparittārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.82:2.1: Saraṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Araṇaṃ mahaggatārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo namahaggatārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā dve …pe… avigate dve.
patthana15.82:3.1: Araṇaṃ appamāṇārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasaraṇo naappamāṇārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṃ …pe… avigate ekaṃ.
